sections.heading: adjacent to district; inclusion; election; how conducted
sections.text: Such election shall be held in the same manner as elections for the original organization of a sanitary drainage district under sections 31-501 to 31-523.SourceLaws 1919, c. 240, ยง 3, p. 1001;C.S.1922, ยง 1882;C.S.1929, ยง 31-620;R.S.1943, ยง 31-
